div.p: >>> TIME NOW FOR THE FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY, THANKSGIVING AND
CHRISTMAS COMING UP FAST, AND SO WE BEGIN THE SEASON OF GIVING,
AT LEAST SOME OF US DO. HERE AT THE FACTOR, WE’LL GIVE
HUNDREDS OF THOUSANDS OF DOLLARS AWAY, MOSTLY TO POOR CHILDREN SO
THEY CAN HAVE SOME NICE PRESENTS AND DECENT MEALS.
IN THAT PURSUIT EVERY YEAR WE SELL FACTOR GIFTS FOR CHRISTMAS,
WE WANT TO GIVE YOU A GOOD PRODUCT, ALL RIGHT?
AND THEN DEVOTE THE MONEY THAT I GET TO CHARITY, THE THEME THIS
YEAR IS USA STRONG, BECAUSE WE REMAIN STRONG.
YOU GUYS MAKE IT POSSIBLE, BY CHECKING OUT OUR INVENTORY.
IF YOU SUBSCRIBE TO THE JUDEO-CHRISTIAN PHILOSOPHY,
GENEROSITY IS A MUST. AND IF YOU SUBSCRIBE TO THIS, WE
SHOULD ALL HELP THOSE WHO ARE LESS FORTUNATE THAN WE ARE.
CHECK OUT BILLO’REILLY.COM, THE FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY.
AND KEN, GO BACK TO LEVIT TOWN, LEAVE THE NFL ALONE, PUBLIC
